paper_abstract: The development and application of Micro-Blog has made it simpler and easier for people to express their feelings. However, with the characteristics of openness and fast-spreading, Micro-Blog can quickly turn a point of view into public opinion. Therefore, Micro-blog opinion evolution and trends prediction has become the focus of people's attentions. This paper develops a Micro-Blog public opinion trends forecasting system using BP neural network. This system can collect and processes data automatically and forecast the tendency of Micro-Blog public opinion.
paper_title: A Forecasting System of Micro-Blog Public Opinion Based on Artificial Neural Network
